title: Fossil Hydrogen
description: 95% of hydrogen today comes from fossil fuels, creating heavy CO₂ emissions.

title: Massive Emissions
description: Hydrogen production emits ~830M tons of CO₂ annually, equal to Germany's emissions.

title: Rising Costs
description: Fossil hydrogen faces carbon taxes, penalties, and volatile fuel prices.

title: ESG Pressure
description: Regulators, investors, and customers demand clean energy compliance.
